message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $8000. To make this opportunity accessible, I am proposing a special introductory price of $12000. This includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated setup service to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your organization.
